1553322222222211.content:
Talk about bad luck, the one map you had of this forest got soaked in a rain storm.The ink is now smeared all over the paper, making any writings indiscernible. You're basically wandering around, hoping you'll find some type of civilization. It's getting dark now, you can't keep walking for much longer, else your body will shut down and rest. As you walk, you notice some smoke from over the bushes. Where there's smoke, there's fire; and where there's fire, there's people. As glad as you were to have found some piece of civilization, it occurred to you that not all who pitch fires are friendly. So, you sneak to a nearby bush and peer through. You see a cozy campfire, frying some fish and sitting at the fire was some type of small, purple creature. She was bipedal, had long - fuzzy ears, and a cannon that was roughly her size. She seems friendly enough, but might seem suspicious if you try and be friendly.

What will you do?
1553322222222211.title: Lost in the Woods

choices: Shoves your head into her mouth.
Burps right in front of your face.
Choked you until you passed out.
15533222222222112.content:
After a bit of thinking, you decide that approaching a stranger at this time of night may not be the best idea. You wait intently as the little thing slowly dozes off to sleep, leaving her fish roasting on the fire. Perfect, you think, I'll just grab this and go. You slowly creep out of the bush and into the clearing by the campfire.

The two fish on campfire's spit are cooked to perfection, leaving them here would be a waste. They had already been flayed, so devouring them was an easy task. As you sit down to enjoy the campfire; you let out a quiet sigh, then let out a not so quiet burp. You cover your mouth and turn to see the creature standing alert, with her cannon pointed at you.

"Who are you?" she asks with anger in her voice.
"I-I'm Anon, I'm sorry I ate your fish, but.."
She starts to approach you, "But what?"
"I-If you had left them, they..."
"Can it," she barks, "Get on your knees." Not wanting to get shot by her large cannon, you get down to your knees and you now look at her eye to eye. "Name's Tristana, by the way," she says as she grabs you by the throat and....
